name: #10 - Creation
description:
(Unmute Sound for Optimal Experience)

Fragment 10 - Creation
(From the BINARY EMOTIONS series)

"The journey is from being a part of creation to being part of the source of creation or the creator. There is such a humble truth hidden in being able to participate in it."

Creation: It's dedicated to the creation of one's dreams. Governed by nature, spiritual contact and the medium of expression the artist translates his innermost world. Although every act of creation must undergo an act of destruction and yet those are not by mere chance. We bring into existence what we are destined to become and only through that metamorphosis can one feel peace; even if it lasts for an instant.
--
"BINARY EMOTIONS" is a series based on 12 Single Edition Fragments in which the artist aims to translate his inner nuances within a specific moment into visuals that evoke certain emotions. An emotional journey digitized into a binary piece cataloged onto the blockchain.
